mapper.select: SELECT i.id AS id, COALESCE(i.invoice_amount, 0) + COALESCE(i.gst, 0) + COALESCE(t.transaction, 0) AS invoice_outstanding FROM invoices AS i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.invoice_id, sum(COALESCE(t.debit, 0) - COALESCE(t.credit, 0)) AS transaction FROM transactions AS t WHERE initial_debit = FALSE AND t.transaction_type_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) GROUP BY t.invoice_id ) AS t ON t.invoice_id = i.id WHERE i.tenant_id = 102
